Mule, a French word, is a style of shoe that is backless and often closed-toed. 
Mules can be any heel height - from flat to high. The style is predominantly (but 
not exclusively) worn by women. ... re-emerged in the late 1990s, especially in its 
open-toed form (the "slide"), and began to dominate the shoe market for women.
